dict.string: We are a go-to framing service for Instagram photos. We frame your favorite moments with archival-quality framing materials at a price point comparable to printing and framing the photos yourself, yet at the convenience of taking only two minutes on your phone.
A portion of all sales made through this app goes to select, local and national organizations benefitting arts in schools and young, up and coming artists.
Each update to the app will display a summary sheet of new features. You can review this list at any time from the Help screen.
Updated to run on all of the latest operating system updates.
App is now fully converted to take advantage of the latest advanced features of Apple's newest programming language, Swift 3+.
Compatible with all iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad Mini, iPad and now the newly released iPad Pro device models.
Devices with 3D Touch capability (iPhone 6S and 6S Plus) can now take advantage of direct access menu features from the Home screen.
